title: Least to Greatest Correlation
question_text: Order the correlation coefficient value from least to greatest from the given scatterplots. Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2016. All rights reserved.

choices.text: B < D < A < C B < D < A < C
A < D < C < B A < D < C < B
B < C < D < A B < C < D < A
D < B < A < C D < B < A < C
A < B < C < D A < B < C < D
